text: Sano naga nsimangene nao (pangondo) aŵala ŵaakufuulu, basi mwakunulani ngosi (mwaulagani mwanakamo), mpaka pati ntupiye kwaulaga ŵanganyao, basi liiyaani matondolo (gakwataŵila, mwakamulani kuŵa mateeka genu), sano panyuma pakwe komboleka gamba kwaleka (mwangali kutola mbote), kapena (kwaleka) pa kuliombola (pakutola mbote), (ntendeje iyyo) mpaka ngondo jiyikane mwakutula misigo jakwe (jiyikane mwakumala). Chalakwecho (ni chilamusi cha Allah). Sano Allah angasache nikuti angamalene nao (Nsyene mwangali jenumanja kumenyana nao), nambo (akunnamula kuputa ngondo) kuti ŵalinje mayeso ŵane mwa jenumanja pa ŵane (ŵakulupilila pa ŵakanila). Sano aŵala ŵaaulajidwe petala lya Allah, basi Jwalakwe ngasagajonanga masengo gao
